attributes.action: Give pads for free because we didn’t ask for period every month.
attributes.additional_details: Women didn’t ask for period! It wasn’t a choice and they shouldn’t cost anything So they should be free since 1/10 girls can’t afford pads in the UK and it isn’t fair that most condoms are free and pads aren’t.
attributes.background: For example a friend of mine couldn’t afford pads so she had to use loo roll and schools also believe that they should be free
